description: Our standard room is designed for a comfortable stay for two people. It comes with basic amenities such as a comfortable bed, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom.
The Deluxe room offers a more spacious and luxurious stay for families or groups of friends. It features a king-size bed, a seating area, and a private balcony with views of the city.
Our Suite room offers the ultimate luxury experience for guests. It features a separate living room, a king-size bed, a Jacuzzi, and a private balcony with panoramic views.
Our Single Room is perfect for solo travellers. It features a comfortable bed, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.
Our Twin Room is designed for two people. It features two single beds, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.
Our Family Room is perfect for families or groups of friends. It features two double beds, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.

This Executive Room features luxury amenities and a spacious layout, including a separate seating area and a large work desk. Guests can enjoy complimentary access to the Executive Lounge, offering complimentary breakfast, refreshments and evening drinks.

Our Accessible Room has been designed to meet the needs of guests with disabilities and features wheelchair accessibility, roll-in shower, grab bars, and other accessibility features. This room also includes all of the standard amenities.
